## Data availability

The different datasets that were used in the publication can be downloaded from GEO with the following accessions: 


```{r echo=FALSE}
ids <- read.delim("../data/geo_ids_ifna.tsv")
knitr::kable(ids,
             col.names=c("GEO ID", "Experiment", "Link"))
```
